## AppModule.upgradeToV2() method

Upgrades the protocol control to v2. In v2, the royalty treasury needs to be set to be set to a splits contract.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
upgradeToV2(upgradeOptions?: {
        splitsModuleAddress?: string;
        splitsRecipients?: NewSplitRecipient[];
    }): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  upgradeOptions | { splitsModuleAddress?: string; splitsRecipients?: [NewSplitRecipient](./sdk.newsplitrecipient.md)<!-- -->\[\]; } |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
